title: (x) Chloë Sevigny new clothing line - Baby Teeth {Ken Messenger}
content:
what in the heck is this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OCCHLOE_3907.jpg)
author: roqmoninof

comments.content: An interpretation of Baby Teeth (Milton Glaser)

AGAIN!

**Heavy Geometric Retro Deco ’80s Sans**
